name: Climbing Hero Free
description: Let’s celebrate love and affection on this Valentine season with an action packed game Climbing Hero. Your beloved is waiting for you at the top of the mountain and her bodyguards are there to stop you. You have no choice other than climbing the hard rock mountain; let’s begin climbing to meet your love. Start your journey from the ground level. Go through all the stages and face each hurdle to reach at the top of the world to meet your love. To make your journey possible, use the power-ups that can increase your immunity, strength and height. Climb up before energy level drops to zero. Avoid hurdles like falling flower pots and wood logs and snake as they can possibly end your life.  Game has two meters, health and height. Health meter will show you how much life is remaining and height meter will show you how much far you are from your love. So enjoy our game this valentine.
